list.name: account
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT account_id FROM aws_iam_policies ORDER BY account_id

targets.rawSql: SELECT 'Admin Policies' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM aws_iam_policies WHERE is_attachable = true AND policy_name LIKE '%Admin%' AND account_id IN ($account) UNION ALL SELECT 'Unencrypted RDS' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM aws_rds_instances WHERE storage_encrypted = false AND db_instance_status = 'available' AND account_id IN ($account) UNION ALL SELECT 'Open Security Groups' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM aws_ec2_security_groups WHERE ip_permissions::text LIKE '%0.0.0.0/0%' AND account_id IN ($account) UNION ALL SELECT 'Users Without MFA' as metric, COUNT(u.*) as value FROM aws_iam_users u LEFT JOIN aws_iam_mfa_devices m ON u.user_name = m.user_name WHERE m.user_name IS NULL AND u.account_id IN ($account) UNION ALL SELECT 'Public S3 Buckets' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM aws_s3_buckets b LEFT JOIN aws_s3_bucket_public_access_blocks pab ON b.name = pab.bucket_arn WHERE pab.public_access_block_configuration IS NULL AND b.account_id IN ($account)

SELECT CASE WHEN policy_name LIKE '%Admin%' OR policy_name LIKE '%FullAccess%' THEN 'High Risk (Admin/Full)' WHEN policy_name LIKE '%ReadOnly%' THEN 'Low Risk (ReadOnly)' WHEN attachment_count = 0 THEN 'Unused Policies' WHEN attachment_count > 10 THEN 'Widely Used' ELSE 'Standard Policies' END as risk_category, COUNT(*) as policy_count FROM aws_iam_policies WHERE is_attachable = true AND account_id IN ($account) GROUP BY CASE WHEN policy_name LIKE '%Admin%' OR policy_name LIKE '%FullAccess%' THEN 'High Risk (Admin/Full)' WHEN policy_name LIKE '%ReadOnly%' THEN 'Low Risk (ReadOnly)' WHEN attachment_count = 0 THEN 'Unused Policies' WHEN attachment_count > 10 THEN 'Widely Used' ELSE 'Standard Policies' END

SELECT 'Total Users' as metric, COUNT(*) as count FROM aws_iam_users WHERE account_id IN ($account) UNION ALL SELECT 'Users with Console Access' as metric, COUNT(*) as count FROM aws_iam_users WHERE password_last_used IS NOT NULL AND account_id IN ($account) UNION ALL SELECT 'Users Never Logged In' as metric, COUNT(*) as count FROM aws_iam_users WHERE password_last_used IS NULL AND account_id IN ($account) UNION ALL SELECT 'Stale Users (>90 days)' as metric, COUNT(*) as count FROM aws_iam_users WHERE password_last_used < NOW() - INTERVAL '90 days' AND account_id IN ($account)

SELECT 'Total IAM Roles' as metric, COUNT(*) as count FROM aws_iam_roles WHERE account_id IN ($account) UNION ALL SELECT 'Service Roles' as metric, COUNT(*) as count FROM aws_iam_roles WHERE assume_role_policy_document::text LIKE '%service%' AND account_id IN ($account) UNION ALL SELECT 'Cross-Account Roles' as metric, COUNT(*) as count FROM aws_iam_roles WHERE assume_role_policy_document::text LIKE '%:root%' AND account_id IN ($account) UNION ALL SELECT 'Recently Created (<30d)' as metric, COUNT(*) as count FROM aws_iam_roles WHERE create_date > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' AND account_id IN ($account)

SELECT policy_name, arn, attachment_count, create_date, CASE WHEN policy_name LIKE '%AdministratorAccess%' THEN 'Critical' WHEN policy_name LIKE '%Admin%' OR policy_name LIKE '%FullAccess%' THEN 'High' WHEN policy_name LIKE '%PowerUser%' THEN 'Medium' ELSE 'Low' END as risk_level, CASE WHEN policy_name LIKE '%AdministratorAccess%' THEN 'Full AWS Access - Highest Privilege' WHEN policy_name LIKE '%Admin%' THEN 'Administrative Access' WHEN policy_name LIKE '%FullAccess%' THEN 'Service Full Access' ELSE 'Review Required' END as risk_description FROM aws_iam_policies WHERE is_attachable = true AND (policy_name LIKE '%Admin%' OR policy_name LIKE '%FullAccess%' OR policy_name LIKE '%PowerUser%') AND account_id IN ($account) ORDER BY CASE WHEN policy_name LIKE '%AdministratorAccess%' THEN 1 WHEN policy_name LIKE '%Admin%' THEN 2 WHEN policy_name LIKE '%FullAccess%' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END, attachment_count DESC

SELECT DISTINCT sg.group_id, sg.group_name, sg.region, sg.vpc_id, rule->>'IpProtocol' as protocol, rule->>'FromPort' as from_port, rule->>'ToPort' as to_port, CASE WHEN rule->>'IpRanges'->0->>'CidrIp' = '0.0.0.0/0' AND (rule->>'FromPort' = '22' OR rule->>'FromPort' = '3389') THEN 'Critical' WHEN rule->>'IpRanges'->0->>'CidrIp' = '0.0.0.0/0' AND rule->>'FromPort' != rule->>'ToPort' THEN 'High' WHEN rule->>'IpRanges'->0->>'CidrIp' = '0.0.0.0/0' THEN 'Medium' ELSE 'Low' END as violation_severity, CASE WHEN rule->>'IpRanges'->0->>'CidrIp' = '0.0.0.0/0' AND (rule->>'FromPort' = '22' OR rule->>'FromPort' = '3389') THEN 'SSH/RDP Open to Internet' WHEN rule->>'IpRanges'->0->>'CidrIp' = '0.0.0.0/0' THEN 'Open to Internet' ELSE 'Permissive Rule' END as violation_type FROM aws_ec2_security_groups sg, jsonb_array_elements(sg.ip_permissions) as rule WHERE (rule->>'IpRanges'->0->>'CidrIp' = '0.0.0.0/0' OR rule->>'IpRanges'->0->>'CidrIp' = '::/0') AND sg.account_id IN ($account) ORDER BY violation_severity, sg.group_name

SELECT u.user_name, u.create_date, u.password_last_used, CASE WHEN u.password_last_used IS NULL THEN 'Never' ELSE EXTRACT(DAY FROM NOW() - u.password_last_used)::text || ' days' END as days_since_login, CASE WHEN u.password_last_used IS NULL THEN 'High' WHEN u.password_last_used < NOW() - INTERVAL '90 days' THEN 'High' WHEN u.password_last_used < NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' THEN 'Medium' ELSE 'Low' END as risk_level, CASE WHEN u.password_last_used IS NULL THEN 'Never logged in - Consider deletion' WHEN u.password_last_used < NOW() - INTERVAL '90 days' THEN 'Stale account - Review access' ELSE 'Active user - Enable MFA' END as recommendation FROM aws_iam_users u LEFT JOIN aws_iam_mfa_devices m ON u.user_name = m.user_name WHERE m.user_name IS NULL AND u.account_id IN ($account) ORDER BY CASE WHEN u.password_last_used IS NULL THEN 1 WHEN u.password_last_used < NOW() - INTERVAL '90 days' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END, u.password_last_used DESC NULLS FIRST

SELECT policy_name, arn, create_date, EXTRACT(DAY FROM NOW() - create_date) as age_days, attachment_count, CASE WHEN EXTRACT(DAY FROM NOW() - create_date) > 180 AND attachment_count = 0 THEN 'Delete - Old & Unused' WHEN EXTRACT(DAY FROM NOW() - create_date) > 90 AND attachment_count = 0 THEN 'Review for Deletion' WHEN attachment_count = 0 THEN 'Monitor Usage' ELSE 'Keep' END as recommendation FROM aws_iam_policies WHERE is_attachable = true AND attachment_count = 0 AND policy_name NOT LIKE 'AWS%' AND account_id IN ($account) ORDER BY age_days DESC, policy_name

WITH security_metrics AS ( SELECT 100 - ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM aws_rds_instances WHERE storage_encrypted = false AND db_instance_status = 'available' AND account_id IN ($account)) * 20 + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM aws_ec2_security_groups WHERE ip_permissions::text LIKE '%0.0.0.0/0%' AND account_id IN ($account)) * 15 + (SELECT COUNT(u.*) FROM aws_iam_users u LEFT JOIN aws_iam_mfa_devices m ON u.user_name = m.user_name WHERE m.user_name IS NULL AND u.account_id IN ($account)) * 10 + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM aws_s3_buckets b LEFT JOIN aws_s3_bucket_public_access_blocks pab ON b.name = pab.bucket_arn WHERE pab.public_access_block_configuration IS NULL AND b.account_id IN ($account)) * 25 ) as compliance_score ) SELECT GREATEST(0, LEAST(100, compliance_score)) as overall_security_score FROM security_metrics

SELECT 'Enable RDS Encryption' as action, COUNT(*) as affected_resources, 'Critical' as priority, 'Encrypt ' || COUNT(*) || ' unencrypted RDS instances' as description FROM aws_rds_instances WHERE storage_encrypted = false AND db_instance_status = 'available' AND account_id IN ($account) HAVING COUNT(*) > 0 UNION ALL SELECT 'Fix Security Groups' as action, COUNT(*) as affected_resources, 'Critical' as priority, 'Restrict ' || COUNT(*) || ' overly permissive security groups' as description FROM aws_ec2_security_groups WHERE ip_permissions::text LIKE '%0.0.0.0/0%' AND account_id IN ($account) HAVING COUNT(*) > 0 UNION ALL SELECT 'Enable S3 Block Public Access' as action, COUNT(*) as affected_resources, 'High' as priority, 'Protect ' || COUNT(*) || ' potentially public S3 buckets' as description FROM aws_s3_buckets b LEFT JOIN aws_s3_bucket_public_access_blocks pab ON b.name = pab.bucket_arn WHERE pab.public_access_block_configuration IS NULL AND b.account_id IN ($account) HAVING COUNT(*) > 0 UNION ALL SELECT 'Enable MFA for Users' as action, COUNT(u.*) as affected_resources, 'High' as priority, 'Enable MFA for ' || COUNT(u.*) || ' users without MFA' as description FROM aws_iam_users u LEFT JOIN aws_iam_mfa_devices m ON u.user_name = m.user_name WHERE m.user_name IS NULL AND u.account_id IN ($account) HAVING COUNT(u.*) > 0 UNION ALL SELECT 'Review Admin Policies' as action, COUNT(*) as affected_resources, 'Medium' as priority, 'Review ' || COUNT(*) || ' high-privilege policies' as description FROM aws_iam_policies WHERE is_attachable = true AND (policy_name LIKE '%Admin%' OR policy_name LIKE '%FullAccess%') AND account_id IN ($account) HAVING COUNT(*) > 0 ORDER BY CASE priority WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1 WHEN 'High' THEN 2 WHEN 'Medium' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END, affected_resources DESC

SELECT DATE_TRUNC('week', create_date) as time, 'IAM Users Created' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM aws_iam_users WHERE create_date > NOW() - INTERVAL '90 days' AND account_id IN ($account) GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('week', create_date) UNION ALL SELECT DATE_TRUNC('week', create_date) as time, 'IAM Roles Created' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM aws_iam_roles WHERE create_date > NOW() - INTERVAL '90 days' AND account_id IN ($account) GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('week', create_date) UNION ALL SELECT DATE_TRUNC('week', create_date) as time, 'IAM Policies Created' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM aws_iam_policies WHERE create_date > NOW() - INTERVAL '90 days' AND is_attachable = true AND account_id IN ($account) GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('week', create_date) ORDER BY time, metric
